sentences.en: Has the parcel been cleared with the border police yet ?
sentences.cn: 那个包裹通过边防警察的检查了 吗 ?

sentences.en: He sends regular food parcels to his family in Libya.
sentences.cn: 他定期给在利比亚的家人邮寄食品包裹。

sentences.en: He tied the parcel with twine.
He undid the string round a parcel.
sentences.cn: 他解开了绑包裹的绳子.

sentences.en: I reached up and put the parcel on top of the cupboard.
sentences.cn: 我伸手托起包裹将它放到了柜子顶上.

sentences.en: I will let the waiter bind up the parcel for you.
sentences.cn: 我让服务生帮你把包裹包起来.

sentences.en: It's all part and parcel— just a day's work really you know.
sentences.cn: 这只是一部分——才一天的工作，你要知道。

sentences.en: Norma looked at the parcel and whistled softly through her teeth.
sentences.cn: 诺尔玛看着包裹,轻柔地哼起了口哨.

sentences.en: Shall I tie up your things in a parcel?
sentences.cn: 我把您的东西包起来,好 吗 ?

sentences.en: She carried the parcel in the crook of her arm.
The children are dying of curiosity to see what's in the parcel.
sentences.cn: 孩子们出于好奇,迫不及待地想看看包裹中是什么东西.

sentences.en: The parcel was delivered last week.
The parcel was directed to the wrong address.

sentences.cn: 这包裹是用快递方式寄出去的.

sentences.en: They were expecting a valuable parcel of diamonds from South Africa.
sentences.cn: 他们正在期待一包来自南非的贵重钻石.

sentences.en: Would you please parcel these apples into three parts?
sentences.cn: 请把这些苹果分成三份好 吗 ?

words.tran_cn: 把…划成部分后分配；把…作成包裹（parcel的ing形式）

phrases.tran_cn: 传包裹（儿童游戏，听音乐传包裹，音乐停止时拿着包裹的儿童可打开一层包裹皮）

trans.tran_cn: 包袱，包裹，（土地的）一块，一批，一群，（货物的）一宗
trans.tran_en: an object that has been wrapped in paper or put in a special envelope, especially so that it can be sent by post

trans.tran_cn: 分，区分，把…划成部分后分配，给…打成包裹，把…拼在一起
